CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for i=1,GetNumQuestLogEntries() do SelectQuestLogEntry(i); SetAbandonQuest(); AbandonQuest(); end

CustomBehavior.GoalText: Waiting for Kodo Ride to Finish. It doesn't need to shoot.
Waiting for Boat Ride to End
Waiting till the Rocket Ride is Over.
Waiting for Kodo Ride to Finish.
